item.title: Access remains popular!
item.dc:creator: Denise Reicher
item.description: I think of Access as the tool to use when Excel isn’t the best solution. There are projects you would … Read More
item.content:encoded: I think of Access as the tool to use when Excel isn’t the best solution. There are projects you would use Word and not Excel, and there are projects where Access just works better than Excel. Steve Comeau addresses this topic in his excellent blog post here.

Using Access or Excel to Manage Your Data

item.title: Why do I need Access if I use Excel?
item.dc:creator: Denise Reicher
item.description: Microsoft has a great article addressing Access and Excel, as does FMS. I have my own ideas as to why a … Read More
item.content:encoded:
Microsoft has a great article addressing Access and Excel, as does FMS. I have my own ideas as to why a Compensation professional would want to use both Access and Excel. Links to both articles:

Microsoft – Top 10 Reasons to use Access with Excel

FMS – Microsoft Access versus Microsoft Excel for Data Analysis and Reporting
